AllSeeing.name: Omniscient Box
AllSeeing.description:
On Open: Reveal 10 random boxes.
After Opening 3 boxes, Lose.

Armageddon.name: Armageddon Box
Armageddon.description: After Opening 3 boxes, Destroy this and all but the outermost boxes.

Auto.name: Auto-Box
Auto.description: After you Open a box, Opens a random adjacent box.

Bank.name: Bank Box
Bank.description: Whenever you Open another box, 33% chance for this box to gain 1 Gold.

Bankrupt.name: Bankrupt Box
Bankrupt.description: On Open: Lose all your Gold.

Bedrock.name: Piggy Bank Box
Bedrock.description:
Cannot be destroyed.
On Click: Transfer all Gold into this box.

BigBomb.name: Big Bomb Box
BigBomb.description: After Opening 3 boxes, explodes, Destroying all boxes within 2 spaces.

BigBrain.name: Big Brain Box
BigBrain.description: Whenever you Open another box, Reveal a random box adjacent to this.

Blackjack.name: Blackjack Box
Blackjack.description: On Open: If 21 other boxes are Open, Win. If more than 21 other boxes are Open, Lose.

Blind.name: Blind Box
Blind.description: On Open: Win. If this is Revealed, it can't be Opened.

Bomb.name: Boombox
Bomb.description: After Opening another box, this explodes, Destroying itself and all adjacent boxes.

Book.name: Book Box
Book.description: On Open: If at least 12 other boxes are Open, Win!

Booster.name: Booster Box
Booster.description: On Click: Transform this into a Rare or rarer box and Close it.

BoxJellyfish.name: Box Jellyfish
BoxJellyfish.description: If at any point 4 or more adjacent boxes are Open, Lose.

Boxton.name: Boxton
Boxton.description: Starts the game Revealed. On Open: Reveal 3 random adjacent boxes.

Brilliant.name: Brilliant Box
Brilliant.description: After Opening 3 boxes that are Rare or rarer, Win.

Bullseye.name: Bullseye Box
Bullseye.description: On Open: If no adjacent boxes are Open, Reveal all adjacent boxes.

Butterfly.name: Butterfly Box
Butterfly.description: If this box is Transformed, Win.

Button.name: Button Box
Button.description: On Click: 95% chance to Transform and Reveal a random adjacent box. Otherwise, Lose.

Cannon.name: Cannon Box
Cannon.description: On Click: Destroy the closest boxes left and right of this.

Capsule.name: Capsule Box
Capsule.description: On Click: Choose a Revealed box. Transform 4 boxes into copies of it and Destroy this.

Careful.name: Careful Box
Careful.description: On Open: If 3 boxes that can make you Lose are Revealed, Win.

Cascade.name: Cascade Box
Cascade.description: If at any point all boxes adjacent to this are Open, Destroy this and Reveal all boxes within 2 spaces.

Cataclysmic.name: Cataclysmic Box
Cataclysmic.description: If at any point there are 30 or fewer unrevealed boxes, Lose.

Catalog.name: Catalogue Box
Catalog.description: On Open: Reveal the boxes directly left and right of this. Whenever you Open a box, if they're Closed, Transform them into random boxes.

Charon.name: Charon Box
Charon.description: On Open: If you have exactly 1 Gold, or if the Underworld Box is Revealed, Win.

Checkbox.name: Checkbox
Checkbox.description: Whenever you Open an unrevealed box, Reveal 1 random box.

Cherry.name: Cherry Box
Cherry.description: Whenever you Open a box, Transform the box to its right into a copy of it.

Cloak.name: Cloak Box
Cloak.description: On Open: If the Wand and Hat Boxes are Open, Win.

Wand.name: Wand Box
Wand.description: On Open: If the Cloak and Hat Boxes are Open, Win.

Hat.name: Hat Box
Hat.description: On Open: If the Cloak and Wand Boxes are Open, Win.

CrystalBall.name: Crystal Ballbox
CrystalBall.description: Whenever you Open another box, Reveal adjacent Cloak, Wand, and Hat Boxes.

Clone.name: Clone Box
Clone.description: After you open a box, Reveal a random adjacent unrevealed box,  and Transform into a Closed copy of it.

CloseSpender.name: Close-Spender Box
CloseSpender.description: On Click: Spend 1 Gold to Close 1 random other box.

Clumsy.name: Clumsy Box
Clumsy.description: Whenever you Open another box, Destroy 1 random box adjacent to it.

Coffee.name: Coffee Box
Coffee.description: The next 2 times you Open a box, immediately Close it.

Collapse.name: Collapse Box
Collapse.description: On Open: Close all adjacent boxes.

Compass.name: Compass Box
Compass.description: Points roughly towards the nearest Flag Box.

Completionist.name: Completionist Box
Completionist.description: If at any point 4 full rows of boxes are Open, Win.

Conveyor.name: Conveyor-Box
Conveyor.description: After you Open another box, shift all boxes in this row to the left.

Copycat.name: Copycat Box
Copycat.description: On Click: Choose a Revealed box. Transform this into it and Close this.

Costly.name: Costly Box
Costly.description: Whenever you Open a box, pay 1 Gold. If you can't, Lose.

Crown.name: Crown Box
Crown.description: On Click: Spend 5 Gold to Win.

Crumbling.name: Crumbling Box
Crumbling.description: Whenever you Open another box, Destroy the top box (left to right).

Cursed.name: Cursed Box
Cursed.description: If you would Win, Destroy this instead.

Dancepad.name: Dancepad Box
Dancepad.description: Points a direction each time you open a box. After opening 6 boxes pointed at in a row, Win.

Daredevil.name: Daredevil Box
Daredevil.description: On Click: 40% chance to Win. Otherwise, Lose.

Darts.name: Dart Box
Darts.description: If at any point the total counters on non-Dart boxes adds to 14 or more, Win.

Demolition.name: Demolition Box
Demolition.description: On Click: Choose a box. Destroy it and this.

Desert.name: Desert Box
Desert.description: On Open: If at least 9 boxes are Destroyed, Win!

Dice.name: Dice Box
Dice.description: On Click: Transform all adjacent boxes into random boxes, Reveal them, then Destroy this.

Disappointed.name: Disappointed Box
Disappointed.description: When another revealed box that can make you Win is Destroyed, Win.

DNA.name: DNA Box
DNA.description: On Open: Transform all adjacent boxes into the same random box, then Reveal them.

Dragon.name: Dragon Box
Dragon.description: On Open: If a Sword Box is open, Win. Otherwise, Lose.

Sword.name: Sword Box
Sword.description: Allows you to slay the Dragon Box.

Princess.name: Princess Box
Princess.description:
Holds 3 Gold.
On Open: If the Dragon Box is Revealed, Lose.

Dungeon.name: Dungeon Box
Dungeon.description: After you Open a non-Spike Box, Transform 2 random unrevealed boxes into Spike Boxes.

Spike.name: Spike Box
Spike.description: On Open: If 3 or more Spike Boxes are Open, Lose.

Eclipse.name: Eclipse Box
Eclipse.description: After 3 Opens, Destroy this and Close all boxes.

Egg.name: Egg Box
Egg.description: If this box is Destroyed, Win.

Ephemeral.name: Ephemeral Box
Ephemeral.description: Whenever you Open a box, Unreveal and Transform all Closed Revealed boxes.

Espionage.name: Espionage Box
Espionage.description: On Open: If at least 18 other boxes are Revealed, Win!

ExtraLife.name: Extra Life Box
ExtraLife.description: If you would Lose, Destroy this instead.

Fairy.name: Fairy Box
Fairy.description: On Open: Transform 1 random Closed box into a Fairy Box. If 4 Fairy Boxes are Open, Win.

Fire.name: Fire Box
Fire.description: On Open: Transform an adjacent box into a Fire Box.

Inferno.name: Inferno Box
Inferno.description: If at any point 6 Fire Boxes are Open, Win.

Match.name: Match Box
Match.description: On Open: Transform 2 random other boxes into Fire Boxes.

Firework.name: Firework Box
Firework.description: On Open: Transform 3 random boxes into Smartbomb Boxes.

FirstAid.name: First-Aid Box
FirstAid.description: On Click: Choose a Destroyed box. Revive it and Destroy this.

Flagseeker.name: Flagseeker Box
Flagseeker.description: Whenever you Open another box, Reveal adjacent Flag Boxes.

Flower.name: Flower Box
Flower.description: The next 4 times an unrevealed box is Transformed, Reveal it.

Fraidy.name: Fraidy Box
Fraidy.description: For the next 5 Opens, you must Open Revealed boxes first.

Framed.name: Framed Box
Framed.description: On Click: Choose a box. Transform it into Winseeker Box and Destroy this. Future Framed Boxes will contain that box instead.

Fridge.name: Fridge Box
Fridge.description: On Open: Reveal all adjacent boxes. For the next 3 Opens, you can't Open them.

Friendly.name: Friendly Box
Friendly.description: You must Open boxes adjacent to this first.

Gamer.name: Gamer Box
Gamer.description: On Open: If you won the last run, Win.

Ghost.name: Ghost Box
Ghost.description: On Open: Transform 2 random boxes into Skull Boxes.

Gift.name: Gift Box
Gift.description: On Open: Reveal 3 random boxes and Close 3 random other boxes.

Jolly.name: Jolly Box
Jolly.description: On Open: Close all Gift Boxes. When you Open a Gift Box, Close it and Destroy this.

Glip.name: glip box
Glip.description:
after you open a box, swaps with a random adjacent box.
reveals unrevealed boxes that it swaps with.

Glitched.name: Glitched Box
Glitched.description: Whenever another box Transforms, it Transforms into a Glitched Box. On Open: If 2 Glitched Boxes are Open, Lose.

Hacker.name: Hackerbox
Hacker.description: Whenever you Open a box, 20% chance to immediately Close it.

Hammer.name: Hammer Box
Hammer.description: Whenever a box is Destroyed, 50% chance to immediately Revive it.

Heart.name: Heart Box
Heart.description: For the next 3 Opens, you can't Lose.

Heartbreak.name: Heartbreak Box
Heartbreak.description: Whenever you Open another box, 10% chance to Lose.

HorizontalSight.name: Horeyezon Box
HorizontalSight.description: On Open: Reveal all boxes in this box's row.

Hourglass.name: Hourglass Box
Hourglass.description: If you would Lose from a non-Hourglass box, prevent it and Lose in 5 opens.

Hungry.name: Hungry Box
Hungry.description:
On Open: Transform 7 random boxes into Food Boxes.
After Opening 7 boxes without using a Food Box, Lose.

Food.name: Food Box
Food.description: On Click: Eat this box, Destroying it.

Ice.name: Ice Box
Ice.description: For the next 3 Opens, you can't Open adjacent boxes.

Impatient.name: Impatient Box
Impatient.description: Whenever you Reveal a box in this row, Open it.

Impossi.name: Impossibox
Impossi.description: After you Open another box, 2% chance to Win.

Inescapable.name: Inescapable Box
Inescapable.description: On Open: Lose. On Reveal: Transform 2 random unrevealed boxes into Inescapable Boxes.

Info.name: Info Box
Info.description: On Open: Reveal 2 random adjacent boxes.

Inky.name: Ink Box
Inky.description: The next time a box would be Revealed, Destroy this instead.

InstaOpener.name: Insta-Opener Box
InstaOpener.description: On Open: Open the boxes to the left and right of this.

Invert.name: Inverted Box
Invert.description: While Open, Winning and Losing are inverted.

Ivy.name: Ivy Box
Ivy.description: On Open: Transform a random box directly above this into an Ivy Box.

JackInThe.name: Jack-In-The-Box
JackInThe.description: Every 5 Opens, Close 1 random other box.

JellyGBox.name: Jelly G.'s Box
JellyGBox.description: On Click: 70% chance to Reveal 1 random box. Otherwise, Destroy this.

Jumpscare.name: Jumpscare Box
Jumpscare.description: On Open: If no other boxes are Open, Lose.

Key.name: Key Box
Key.description: If the next box you Open is a Lockbox, Win. Otherwise, Destroy this.

Lock.name: Lockbox
Lock.description: Secrets inside - if only you had a Key Box...

Ladder.name: Ladder Box
Ladder.description: If at any point exactly one box in each row is Open, Win.

Legacy.name: Legacy Box
Legacy.description:
On Click: Win.
5 uses left... PERMANENTLY!

Locust.name: Locust Box
Locust.description: After you Open another box, Destroy the leftmost box in each row.

Logical.name: Logical Box
Logical.description: Whenever a box is Destroyed, Reveal it.

Lonely.name: Lonely Box
Lonely.description: On Open: If this is adjacent to a Destroyed box, Lose.

Loser.name: L Box
Loser.description: On Open: If this is adjacent to an Open box, Lose.

Lucky.name: Lucky Box
Lucky.description: Double all percentage chances on boxes.

Lunar.name: Lunar Box
Lunar.description: On Click: Close 5 random other boxes, then Destroy this.

Map.name: Map Box
Map.description: On Open: Reveal the X Box.

Treasure.name: X Box
Treasure.description: On Open: If there is an unbroken path of Open boxes to a Map Box, Win.

Microscope.name: Microscope Box
Microscope.description: When you try to Open an unrevealed box, 15% chance to Reveal it instead.

Microtransaction.name: Shatterbox
Microtransaction.description: On Click: Spend 3 Orbs to Win.

Mimic.name: Box Mimic
Mimic.description: If Revealed, appears to be a random other box. On Open: 50% chance to Lose.

Mine.name: Mine Box
Mine.description: Whenever you Open an adjacent box, this box gains 1 Gold.

Monopoly.name: Monopoly Box
Monopoly.description: Holds 1 Gold. On Click: 50% chance to double this box's Gold. Otherwise, Destroy this.

Monster.name: Monster Box
Monster.description: After you Open another box, Destroys a random adjacent box and swaps places with it.

Negative.name: Negative Box
Negative.description: If you would Win, 25% chance to prevent that Win.

OrbBlast.name: Orb Blast Box
OrbBlast.description: On Open: Transform 1 random box in each direction from this into an Orb Box.

Orb.name: Orb Box
Orb.description: On Open: If all Orb Boxes are Open, Win.

Otherworld.name: Otherworld Box
Otherworld.description: On Click: Transform ALL Revealed boxes into random boxes.

Pandoras.name: Pandora's Box
Pandoras.description: On Open: Transform all other Revealed boxes into Skull Boxes.

Patterned.name: Patterned Box
Patterned.description: On Open: For each adjacent box, Transform 1 random unrevealed box into copies of it.

PayForReveals.name: Telescope Box
PayForReveals.description: On Click: Spend 1 Gold to Reveal 1 random box.

Antidote.name: Antidote Box
Antidote.description: On Open: Destroy Revealed Poison Boxes and Viral Boxes.

Police.name: Police Box
Police.description: On Open: If 12 other boxes are Open, Lose.

Portal.name: Portal Box
Portal.description: On Click: Choose a box. This box swaps places with it. Can be used 2 times.

PriceyRowRevealer.name: Psychic Box
PriceyRowRevealer.description: On Click: Spend 3 Gold to Reveal all boxes in a random row.

Programmed.name: Programmed Box
Programmed.description: For the next 4 Opens, you can only Open the highest boxes.

Puzzle.name: Puzzle Box
Puzzle.description:
If at any point 30 boxes or more are Destroyed, Win.
On Click: Destroy 6 random boxes.

Queen.name: Queen Box
Queen.description: After Opening 3 boxes in any direction from this, Lose.

Reset.name: Reset Box
Reset.description: On Open: Close, Unreveal, and Transform all Open boxes within 2 spaces of this.

Ritual.name: Ritual Box
Ritual.description: After you Open another box, gains a charge. On Click: Destroy this and Reveal  random boxes equal to its charge.

Rocket.name: Rocket Box
Rocket.description: On Open: Destroy 3 random other boxes.

Rogue.name: Rogue Box
Rogue.description: After you Open another box, swaps places with an adjacent box. If this box is Destroyed, Lose.

RowBomb.name: Rowbomb Box
RowBomb.description: If you Open another box in the same row as this, explodes, Destroying all boxes in the row.

RowGold.name: Rowgold Box
RowGold.description: Holds 1 Gold for each other Open box in this row.

RowSweeper.name: Row-Sweeper Box
RowSweeper.description: Displays the number of boxes in this row that can make you Lose.

Rowwin.name: Rowwin Box
Rowwin.description: On Open: If all boxes in this row are open, Win.

RowWinseeker.name: Row-Winseeker Box
RowWinseeker.description: Displays the number of boxes in this row that can make you Win.

Sacrificial.name: Sacrificial Box
Sacrificial.description: On Click: Destroy 1 random box, then Reveal 1 random box. Can be used 5 times.

Safeguard.name: Safeguard Box
Safeguard.description: On Click: Choose an unrevealed box. Reveal it and Destroy this.

School.name: School Box
School.description: On Open: Transform 3 random unrevealed boxes into Fish Boxes.

Fish.name: Fish Box
Fish.description: On Open: If 3 or more Fish Boxes are Open, Win.

Scrap.name: Scrap Box
Scrap.description: Whenever another box is Destroyed, Reveal 1 random box.

Searchlight.name: Searchlight Box
Searchlight.description: The next time you Open a box, Reveal all boxes adjacent to it and Destroy this.

SelfDestruct.name: Self-Destruct Box
SelfDestruct.description: After opening another box, this explodes, Destroying itself.

Sentinel.name: Gazing Box
Sentinel.description: Looks towards boxes you Open in any direction. You can't Open boxes it's looking at.

Seven.name: Seven Box
Seven.description: On Open: If exactly 7 boxes are Open, including this box, Win.

Shy.name: Shy Box
Shy.description: Whenever you Open another box, 33% chance to Close this box.

Sleepy.name: Sleepy Box
Sleepy.description: On Open: Reveal and Destroy all Flag and Skull Boxes.

Slime.name: Slime Box
Slime.description: After you Open a box, Destroys itself and Transforms two random adjacent boxes into Slime Boxes.

Slots.name: Slots Box
Slots.description: Whenever you Open an adjacent box, Transform 1 random unrevealed box into a Flag Box.

SmartBomb.name: Smartbomb Box
SmartBomb.description:
On Open: Reveal all adjacent boxes.
After Opening 2 boxes, explodes, Destroying all adjacent boxes.

Sniper.name: Sniper Box
Sniper.description: Whenever another box is Closed, Destroy it.

Soap.name: Soap Box
Soap.description: On Click: Choose a box. Transform it into an Empty Box and Reveal it. Can be used 3 times.

Speedrun.name: Speedrun Box
Speedrun.description: On Open: If no other boxes are Open, Win.

Sponge.name: Spongebox
Sponge.description:
On Reveal: Reveal 2 random adjacent boxes.
(Opening a box counts as Revealing it.)

Stamp.name: Stamp Box
Stamp.description: On Open: Reveal all boxes with duplicates.

Star.name: Star Box
Star.description: On Open: If all adjacent boxes are Open, Win!

Sus.name: Imboxtor
Sus.description: Transforms a random unrevealed box into a Box Mimic of another unrevealed box, then Reveal them.

Sweeper.name: Sweeper Box
Sweeper.description: Displays the number of adjacent boxes that can make you Lose.

Tape.name: Tape Box
Tape.description: On Click: Choose an Open box. Close it and Destroy this.

Territory.name: Territory Box
Territory.description: While Open, you can only open boxes adjacent to another Open box.

Tetris.name: Tetribox
Tetris.description: Whenever you Open the last Closed box in a row, Reveal 2 random boxes in the row below it.

Three.name: Three Box
Three.description: On Open: If this is the 3rd time you've Opened this box, Win.

Toolbox.name: Toolbox
Toolbox.description: On Open: Transform the boxes above this into a Tape Box and a Demolition Box.

Transmog.name: Transmog Box
Transmog.description: On Click: Choose a Revealed box. Transform it into a random box and Destroy this.

Trigaze.name: Tri-gaze Box
Trigaze.description: On Open: Reveal the corner boxes.

Turret.name: Turret Box
Turret.description: After you Open a box, Destroy the box this is pointing at, then this rotates clockwise.

Two.name: Two Box
Two.description: If at any point 2 Revealed boxes adjacent to this are the same, Win.

UFB.name: UFB
UFB.description:
After you open a box directly above this, swaps places with it.
If at any point this is in the top row, Win.

Underrated.name: Underrated Box
Underrated.description: On Open: Reveal the unrevealed box you've Opened the least.

Underworld.name: Underworld Box
Underworld.description: On Open: Lose. Then, if you didn't Lose, Win.

Unrevealed.name: Mystery Box
Unrevealed.description: Click this box to Open it!

Unstable.name: Unstable Box
Unstable.description: When you try to Open a box, 25% chance to Destroy it instead.

Vampire.name: Vampire Box
Vampire.description: After you Open a box, Destroys 2 random other Revealed boxes. If it can't, Lose.

Viral.name: Viral Box
Viral.description: When you Open a box, Transform a random box adjacent to this into a Decayed Box, Open it, and swap places with it.

Decayed.name: Decayed Box
Decayed.description: On Open or Transform: If 5 Decayed Boxes are Open, Lose.

Vortex.name: Vortex Box
Vortex.description: If at any point all boxes within 2 spaces of this are Open, Win.

Waterfall.name: Waterfall Box
Waterfall.description: On Open: If this is in the bottom row, Win. Otherwise, Transform a random box in the row below into a Waterfall Box.

Wave.name: Wave Box
Wave.description: On Open: Open all boxes to the right of this.

Whacka.name: Whack-a-Box
Whacka.description:
On Open: Transform a random adjacent closed box into a Whack-a-Box.
If this is the third Whack-a-Box Opened consecutively, Win.

WinSeeker.name: Winseeker Box
WinSeeker.description: Displays the number of adjacent boxes that can make you Win.

Winter.name: Winter Box
Winter.description: On Open: Transform 4 random other boxes into Ice Boxes.

Worldbearer.name: Worldbearer Box
Worldbearer.description: If this box is Destroyed, Lose.
